<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>キャベツパルト＋スイカパルト</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: スイカの鉢
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Frugal Melonの鉢 can't stand to see スイカパルト throw melons without a thought for cost, so after defeating the zombies, Melonの鉢 secretly collects the shattered melon fragments scattered on the ground. "This is called soilless cultivation," Melonの鉢 explained. "Not just any plant can be grown in the ground here; every inch of soil is precious."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>上にあるスイカのスプラッシュダメージを倍増させ、衰退はありません。ダメージは基本ダメージの2/3のままです。

<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>植木鉢＋スイカパルト</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: サラダパルト
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"When I was little, everyone asked what kind of Pult I wanted to be," says Salad-pult. "They thought you couldn't have it all. But I decided I wanted everything—even back then."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>連続して混合野菜を発射することができます。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>140/5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>42％の確率で連続して発射します。弾丸はゾンビにヒットした後、コーンの粒（バター1/4の確率）とキャベツに分裂します。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>キャベツパルト＋カーネルパルト＋スイカパルト</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: ニンニクの傘
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Come, give Umbrella Clove a hug. You focus on opening the door; let Umbrella Clove handle the rest! The RV doesn't matter; it's the brains inside that count!" Umbrella Clove says. "And one more thing—fight zombies with zombies! And pour some tea for Umbrella Clove while you're at it! Zombies, zombies, go away!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ゾンビを撃退させ、レーンを変更させます。

<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>1000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>近くのゾンビを撃退させ、レーンを変更させます。各撃退で耐久力が減少します。トウモロコシの傘を参照してください。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ニンニク＋傘の葉</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: キャベツの傘
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>When asked about her secret to success, Umbrella Kale replied, "Actually, I just really enjoy letting balls rest on my head." She paused, "But the other plants all praise me as a top-notch protector."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>カタパルト型の弾丸を受け取ることができる。ゾンビがいない場合は弾丸を一時的に蓄積し、ダメージを大幅に増加させます。

<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>1000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>カタパルトがターゲットとして優先します。また、弾丸のダメージを80％増加させ、近づくゾンビを撃退させ、耐久力が減少します。トウモロコシの傘を参照してください。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>キャベツパルト＋傘の葉</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: メカ・ナッツ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Some may not realize it, but ウォールナッツs have inventors in their community. Inspired by zombie weaponry, they built their own war machines. "Zombie technology, ironically, only destroys itself," says Mecha-nut.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ハラペーニョまたは氷キノコの影響を受けることができ、死後に効果を発揮します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>氷キノコまたはハラペーニョの影響を受けると、3000の耐久力を回復します。変化後のフォームからの効果は死んだときに放出されます。3*3の範囲内の他の植物にダメージを吸収し、最大HPを超える回復（最大4倍）を行います。ゾンビのドロップが消えると、超級メカ・ナッツが存在しないときに各メカ・ナッツに1000のHPを回復します。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋メカ断片</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: ニンニクの鉢
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>ニンニクの鉢 has long wanted to help the plants in its pot get a thorough sterilization, especially those on the front lines in direct contact with zombies. However, it seems only ニンニク-type plants are willing to grow in its pot. "Some plants would rather face zombies than catch my ニンニク smell," ニンニクの鉢 sighed. "Now I can only use ニンニク to disinfect ニンニク, and they just say it's a perfect match."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ニンニク型植物上にダメージを減少させ、ニンニク効果を持っています。

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>ゾンビを中央のレーンに動かさせます。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>植木鉢＋ニンニク</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: スイカの傘
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Give me a melon; I'll repay you with kindness." Umbrella Rind has always admired this saying from ancient poetry. Plants don't need to bribe him for help—whatever they give, he returns. Well, except basketballs. He's a total basketball fan.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>バスケットボールをはじき返し、スイカを発射します。

<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>2000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>ゾンビの弾丸、爆発を含むすべてをはじくことができますが、200の耐久力を失います。各反射で弾丸のダメージに等しいエネルギーを蓄積し、ゾンビに追加のダメージを与えるために撃退が発生します。各撃退で耐久力が減少します。トウモロコシの傘を参照してください。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>傘の葉＋スイカパルト</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: タイタンスイカ大砲
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Melon Cannon is a fervent advocate of the "overwhelming firepower" doctrine: "If one shot doesn't do it, try two, three, or even four!" This approach has made it a powerhouse on the battlefield—and a hit at summer parties.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>手動でスイカの弾幕を上から発射します。
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>200 / スイカ。3×3の範囲内で最大40個のスイカを発射、衰退なし。5×3のグリッド内でランダムにヒットします。</color>
<color=black>リロード：</color><color=#8B0000>36秒</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>Cob Cannon＋スイカパルト</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 葉の鉢
plants.introduce: Other 植木鉢s are puzzled by the dense foliage of Umbrellaの鉢, but Umbrellaの鉢 simply says, "I just read the book Theの鉢's Guide to Hair Care."
plants.info:
<size=36>傘の葉の融合を強化します。

<color=black>トウモロコシの傘：</color> <color=#8B0000>+2秒の移動制限、＋50%撃退距離</color>
<color=black>スイカの傘：</color> <color=#8B0000>反射された弾丸のダメージを倍増させます。</color>
<color=black>アンブレラクロー、銀／金／ダイヤモンド／エメラルド／ルビーの傘： </color><color=#8B0000>撃退距離を倍増させます。</color>
<color=black>キャベツの傘：</color> <color=#8B0000>隣接したレーンのゾンビも攻撃できます。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>植木鉢＋傘の葉</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 銀のキャベツ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Besides a shiny silver exterior, 銀のキャベツ also has a heart of silver. 銀のキャベツ dreams of becoming a teacher and already has a catchphrase in mind: "銀のキャベツ Instructor, at your service."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>銀のキャベツを投げてゾンビを攻撃します。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/3秒</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>マリーゴールド＋キャベツパルト</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 金のキャベツ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>金のキャベツ isn't just about its dazzling appearance—it has a heart of pure gold. It relishes fighting alongside plants against zombies and dreams of one day being honored as the "Heroic Cabbage of Gold."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>金のキャベツを投げてゾンビを攻撃します。必殺技では、すべてのゾンビにキャベツを投げます！

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>120/3秒</color>
<color=black>必殺技：</color><color=#8B0000>1000コインを消費；すべてのゾンビにキャベツを投げ、300以下のHPのゾンビは即死します。</color>
<color=black>アップグレードコスト：</color><color=#8B0000>1000 コイン</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 銀の鉢
plants.introduce: "People are always saying 'gold this, silver that,' as if we have a hierarchy," Silverの鉢 said. "マリーゴールド is silver, yet it's still called a Marigold." His words might have been more convincing if his gaze weren't fixed on the coffee bean by the roof's edge.
plants.info:
<size=36>追加のコインを生成します。

<color=black>コイン生産量：</color><color=#8B0000>25/25秒</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>植木鉢＋マリーゴールド</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 金の鉢
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Many wealthy folks treat money like dirt, but I'm different," 金のPot explains. "That's how I became rich in the first place."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>追加のコインを生成し、上にある金の植物の必殺技を強化します。

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>上にある金の植物の必殺技を発動させると、他の金の鉢にある同じかそれ以下の必殺技コストのすべての金の植物の必殺技も発動します。 </color>
<color=black>アップグレードコスト：</color><color=#8B0000>2000コイン；各既存の金の鉢がコストを指数関数的に増加させます。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 銀のカーネル
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Why throw silver coins at zombies? Why, why? Even if zombies are just game data, we still ought to show them some final respects." 銀のKernel was once an usher in a theater, but after discovering his knack for lecturing, he entered the world of public speaking, bringing along his butter and corn kernels.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>銀のカーネルと銀のマネーバッグを投げてゾンビを攻撃し、コインを得るチャンスがあります。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>40/3秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>1/4の確率で銀のマネーバッグを投げ、60ダメージを与え、ゾンビを4秒間移動不能にし、25コインをドロップします。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>カーネルパルト＋マリーゴールド</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 金のカーネル
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>金のカーネル ponders words like "golden phrases" and "precious gems." But maybe true treasure lies in imported butter and gold missiles... or "Just Gold."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>金のカーネルとバターをゾンビに投げ、コインを生成するチャンスがあります。必殺技では、金のポップコーンをゾンビに発射します。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>60/3秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>25%の確率でマネーバッグを投げ、80ダメージを与え、ゾンビを4秒間スタンさせ、100コインをドロップします。</color>
<color=black><color=black>必殺技：</color><color=#8B0000>3500コイン消費；金のカーネル爆弾を4個発射し、それぞれが3×3の範囲で450ダメージを与えます。</color>
<color=black>アップグレードコスト：</color><color=#8B0000>2000 コイン</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 双子マリーゴールド
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"It's time to make gold coins!" one of the 双子マリーゴールド sister declares. But the other sister insists, "Now's the perfect time for a silver coin!" Since they can never agree, they each produce their own share independently, which might actually be for the best. "Double opinions, double efficiency—isn't that right?"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>コインの生産量が2倍になります！
<color=black>コイン生産量：</color><color=#8B0000>20秒ごとに2倍のコインを生成、それ以外はマリーゴールドと同じです。.</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>マリーゴールド＋マリーゴールド</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 銀のスイカ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>銀のスイカ sometimes considers itself the most valuable melon—until it remembers the more prestigious 金のスイカ. "A melon is a melon, whether it's silver, gilded, or made with ニンニク or gold," 銀のスイカ chuckles. "We all have our place in the soil."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>銀のスイカを投げてゾンビを攻撃します。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>160/3秒</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>マリーゴールド＋スイカパルト</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 金のスイカ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>金のスイカ doesn't mind questions about its golden rind and seeds, but never ask if it's seedless—it has no patience for that question.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>金のスイカをゾンビに投げ、必殺技では画面全体に金のスイカを降らせます。
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>240/3秒</color>
<color=black>必殺技：</color><color=#8B0000>2500コイン消費；60個の金のスイカを発射し、それぞれが120ダメージを与え、ランダムに画面上に落ちます。</color>
<color=black>アップグレードコスト：</color><color=#8B0000>3000 コイン</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 銀の傘
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>銀の傘 is always anxious about someone stealing his money when he's away, so he carries his fortune with him everywhere—even into battle against zombies. He thinks this keeps his wealth safe, but it only adds new risks. "That's my money; you can't take it!" he complains, though no one ever listens.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>バスケットボールを反射することで追加のコインを生成します。
<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>1000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>反射するたびに25コインをドロップし、近づいてくるゾンビをノックバックさせ、毎回耐久力が減少します。トウモロコシの傘を参照。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>傘の葉＋マリーゴールド</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 金の傘
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>金の傘 doesn't like this place—after a mishap in the water, it was shipped here alongside 銀の傘. The memory still frustrates him. "It's unfair! Why am I the freebie here?"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>バスケットボールを反射し、追加のコインを生成し、必殺技で空中のインプを投げ飛ばし、近くのゾンビを全て撃退します。

<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>1000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>バスケットボールを反射するたびに50コインをドロップし、近づいてくるゾンビを撃退させ、毎回耐久力が減少します。トウモロコシの傘を参照。</color>
<color=black>必殺技：</color><color=#8B0000>2000 コイン消費；近くのゾンビを全てノックバックさせ、25コインをドロップ、空中のインプを投げ飛ばし、3つのダイヤモンドをドロップします。</color>
<color=black>アップグレードコスト：</color><color=#8B0000>1000コイン</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 銀のニンニク
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Does a ニンニク made of silver still smell like ニンニク? Probably not, but neither the plants nor the zombies were eager to test it. However, zombies soon regretted their curiosity after a taste!</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>もしかしたらもっと強烈なニンニクかも？たぶん。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>600</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>マリーゴールド＋ニンニク</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 金のニンニク
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Beneath its dazzling exterior lies an unbearable ニンニク scent. 金のニンニク muses, "True value is only in appearance, not in the details." But everyone knows this "golden" ニンニク is just a regular ニンニク with a shiny coat.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>さらに強力で金色の香りがするニンニク。必殺技で前方のすべてのゾンビを別のレーンに移動させます。
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>900</color>
<color=black>必殺技：</color><color=#8B0000>1000コイン消費；すべてのゾンビをそのレーンから別のれに移動させます。</color>
<color=black>アップグレードコスト：</color><color=#8B0000>1000 コイン</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: ヒプノナッツ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>ヒプノナッツ has a soft spot for zombies: "There's something oddly pleasant about the way they nibble on me. It's not like scratching an itch… let's just call it affection from prolonged contact," it says, philosophically.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ゾンビを魅了し、30秒ごとに謎の箱ゾンビを召喚！
<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>噛まれるたびに4%の確率でゾンビを魅了します。また、フラフラキノコの胞子を受けることで100HPを回復し、受けた胞子の色ごとに1個の胞子を蓄積（最大3個）します。7色の胞子を集めると、各色1個を消費して金の謎の箱ゾンビを召喚し、完全回復します。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋ヒプノキノコ</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: ダイヤモンドの傘
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Alchemist Umbrella is a tycoon among plants, providing jobs for zombies and plants alike. "I maximize their value," it declares with a gilded flourish to its spectacles.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ハイリスク・ハイリターン！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>ニンニクの傘と金の傘の特性を持っています。</color>
<color=black>必殺技：</color><color=#8B0000>2500コイン消費；近くのすべてのゾンビを撃退させ、HPが25%未満のゾンビは銀の像（1000コイン相当）に、HPが10%未満のゾンビは金の像（3000コイン相当）に変わります。像にならなかったゾンビはコインをドロップします。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>金のニンニク＋傘の葉（または金の傘＋ニンニク）</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 炎スイカ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The plants always feel that red-rinded watermelons carry the festive vibe of New Year, crackling and popping with excitement. But the watermelon explains, 'I didn’t put firecrackers in the melon! It’s just that sealed food explodes when heated—and you can’t rush eating a hot watermelon!'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>灼熱のスイカを投げつけます！

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>160/3秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>炎上のデバフを与えます。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>スイカパルト＋ハラペーニョ</color>

plants.name: 金の磁石
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>After working countless hours at an accoutant firm, the Gold Magnet realized its terrifying attracting potential and switched careers to become a fighter. 'Honestly, this is way more fun than counting money,' it remarks. 'After all, money doesn't grow on trees, but they do somehow from crops.' That said, its plant companions often end up suffering from its antics.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>弾を引き寄せます！

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>隣接するれからまっすぐ飛んでくる弾を引き寄せ、その弾1発ごとに25コインを生成します。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>磁石キノコ＋マリーゴールド</color>

plants.name: 超級メカ・ナッツ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Giga Mecha-nut has always been passionate about environmental protection. 'I have a love-hate relationship with zombies—they pollute the environment, but they also bring me wealth. Isn’t owning property and a trailer the hallmark of success? The lawn is clean all thanks to me!'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ただのフィッシュボールかもしれない。知るか？

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>ゾンビの金属のドロップが消えると、フィールド上のすべての超級メカ・ナッツのHPを8000回復します。ウォールナッツを使うことでHPを8000即回復し、ロボ魚を召喚します。回復は最大HPを超えることがあります。チェリージラと同じ耐圧特性を持ち、1回のヒットで受けるダメージは8000で制限されます。3×3の範囲でダメージを自分に集めます。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋超級メカ断片</color>

plants.name: バックキノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>バックキノコ has a constant worry: he’s terrified of 磁石キノコ accidentally pulling him in. 'Where did my screws go?' As Crazy Dave walks up, it seems he is about to have a brand-new concern.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>バックキノコも驚くほどノックバックされます。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/2秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>弾がゾンビを撃退させ、網戸を簡単に破壊します。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ピーキノコ＋バケツ</color>

plants.name: スプリットエンドウキノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>The front head declares, 'My turn to use the eyebrow!' The back head replies, 'Guess we’ll have to split it.' Born just two minutes apart, their eternal battle over the eyebrow shows no signs of stopping.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>前方と後方にエンドウを発射します。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20×3/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>後方のエンドウはゾンビに当たらない場合、跳ね返ります。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>パフキノコ＋エンドウシューター * 3</color>

plants.name: 太陽磁石キノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Have you heard? 太陽磁石キノコ's been glowing with wealth lately! 'I don’t produce iron; I just do the delivery,' he says proudly. 'This is all from years of hard work.' Word is, he’s even opened business beyond the lawn!' </color>
plants.info:
<size=36>金属物体を生成し、金属物体を太陽に変換します。

<color=black>太陽生産量：</color><color=#8B0000>25/25秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>30秒ごとにランダムな金属物体を生成し、それを使うと25太陽を生成します。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ヒマワリ＋マグネキノコ</color>

plants.name: 金のスパイク
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>总有人分不清火炬生产的地刺和普通地刺的区别，但火炬地刺本身很清楚：这再明显不过了，我让他们所走的道路成为了一条更加阳光明亮的康庄大道。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>火焰地刺？地刺とあまり違いはないかもしれません。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>300</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>？</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>不明</color></size>

plants.name: 金のケルプ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>火焰缠绕水草一直泡在水里，但这压根不影响它给植物们烤海带吃。呃，味道很奇怪就是了。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>火焰缠绕水草？缠绕水草とあまり違いはないかもしれません。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>300</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>？</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>不明</color></size>

plants.name: 魅惑磁石キノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>After countless days and nights of research, Charm Magnet finally mastered the art of the magnetic charm field. 'Now I can better persuade zombie friends to fight alongside us,' he said. 'Some think I threaten them with metal tools, but one day, the truth will come to light.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>金属物体を消費して、対応するゾンビを召喚して戦わせます。

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>金属物体を使って催眠状態のゾンビを召喚し、太陽磁石キノコが生成する金属や磁石キノコの磁力システムで消費された金属を自動で使用します。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ヒプノキノコ＋磁石キノコ</color>

plants.name: 磁力キノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>'I used to ferment bread,' Lure-shroom explained, 'but now I collect metal to build the bread ovens.'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>鉄バケツを載せると面白い結果になるかもしれません。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>金属ゾンビに対してダメージが2倍になります。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ガスキノコ＋磁石キノコ</color>

plants.name: 錆キノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>'I got canned again!' Cries Rust-shroom who used to be Lure-shroom just a moment ago, 'All I did was accidentally making a coffee maker rather than an oven!'</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ラグビーヘルメットを与えると、さらに一捻りがあるかもしれません?

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>40/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>防具に対してダメージが3倍になります。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ガスキノコ＋磁石キノコ＋バケツ</color>

plants.name: ラグビーキノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>'I've always dreamed of being a rugby player, and now I've finally got this hat of glory,' said Rugby-shroom proudly. 'But today, I've decided to take a break on the sidelines.' In reality, he's just a stadium security, keeping the overenthusiastic fans out with his spores.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>すべての種類の防具を貫通する煙を吹きかけます！

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>3000</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>防具とその中のゾンビに同時にダメージを与えます。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ガスキノコ＋磁石キノコ＋バケツ＋ラグビーヘルメット</color>

plants.name: タイタンエンドウ砲塔
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>エンドウ豆家族の究極兵器のひとつであるタイタンエンドウ砲塔は、「理由なく寝そべるな」と常に教えられている。「でも、頭がすごく重いんだよ！」叱られるたびに彼はそう愚痴をこぼす。もちろん、エンドウ豆の長老たちが彼に寝そべるなと言うのは、単純にその姿が可愛すぎるからだということを、彼は知らない。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ゾンビに向けて豆の地獄を解き放つ！

<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>1000</color>
<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>初期 20×30/1.5秒</color><color=red> 最大 20×60/1.5秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>砲塔の連射速度は撃ち続けるほど上昇し、3段階に強化される。攻撃がリセットされると元の速度に戻る。砲塔の高さの関係で、豆がインプに当たらないことがある。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>リピーター＋スリーピーター＋リピーター＋ヒカマホウ (スリーピーターに ヒカマホウを配置)</color>

plants.name: チェリー地雷
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>チェリー地雷は一流のシェフであり、彼の「ハッシュチェリー」や「ポテトジャム」は植物界で高く評価されている。材料がなくなると、陽気にこう言う。「ちょっと買いに行くよ。」</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>周囲のタイルに8つのジャガイモ地雷を配置する。

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>1800</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>倒された際、3×3範囲にジャガイモ地雷を生成する。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>ジャガイモ地雷＋チェリー爆弾</color>

plants.name: ハラペーニョ地雷
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>ハラペーニョ地雷はチェリー地雷の有能な助手だが、彼女の料理はほとんど低評価を受けている。「どうして…？」と罪悪感を抱くハラペーニョ地雷。しかしその理由は、彼女が辛さに鈍感で、いつも唐辛子を入れすぎてしまうことだった。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>自分のいるレーンに7つのジャガイモ地雷を配置する。

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>1800</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>倒された際、自分のレーンに7つのジャガイモ地雷を生成する。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>ジャガイモ地雷＋ハラペーニョ</color>

plants.name: チェリーパンプキン
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>チェリーパンプキンはチェリーナッツの遠い親戚だが、会うたびにいつも遅刻してしまう。「早く行きたいんだけど…」とパンプカブームは言う。「でも赤いものを見ると、つい飛びついちゃうんだ。」</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>チェリーでは爆発しないパンプキン！

<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>4000</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>ゾンビのチェリー爆弾攻撃を無効化し、ダメージを受ける代わりに回復する。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>パンプキン＋チェリー爆弾</color>

plants.name: 雪エンドウ大将
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>エンドウ家の総司令官である雪エンドウ大将は、遠く離れた植物やゾンビですら震え上がるほどの威圧感を放つ。しかし、彼が誇る冷凍能力について、雪エンドウ大将は決して語らなかった――ある日、小さなエンドウ豆が彼の日記を偶然開くまでは。「もし知っていたら、火付け狙撃エンドウと賭けなんてしなかったのに。氷原で凍死寸前になっただけでなく、こんな姿になってしまった。今夜こそ、あいつにチリを三杯食わせてやる――」</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ゾンビにスノーピーを発射し、低確率で大量の弾幕を撃つ！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>20×6/1.5秒</color>
<color=#3D1400></color><color=red>必殺技：3×20/0.02秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>攻撃時、3%の確率で氷エンドウの弾幕を発射する。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>エンドウ大将＋氷キノコ</color>

plants.name: チェリーの磁石
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>「売れることも一種の才能さ。」チェリーの磁石はそう言った。磁石キノコたちだけが憎しみを愛に変えることができる。彼はかつてチェリーが大嫌いだった。いや、実は今も嫌いだ。しかし、そこにビジネスチャンスを見出したのかもしれない？</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>金属オブジェクトを爆発性チェリーに変換する！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>300/2.5秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>金属オブジェクトを吸収し、爆発性チェリーに変換する。1つの金属オブジェクトにつき4つのチェリーを作成可能。金属オブジェクトを能動的に与えることで、攻撃を発動できる。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>磁石キノコ＋チェリー爆弾</color>

plants.name: 火付け狙撃エンドウ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>他の狙撃エンドウたちは、火付け狙撃エンドウが指揮官の信頼厚い補佐役であることを羨ましがっている。まだ小さな彼女だが…。「才能は一つの要素だけど…指揮官に育ててもらったことに感謝してるんだよ！〜」と彼女は言う。しかし実際には、雪エンドウ大将が冷たすぎるせいで、火付け狙撃エンドウを温まり役として手元に置いているだけだった。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>マップ上のどこにいるゾンビにも狙いを定められる！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>300/3秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>攻撃が「炎上」効果を引き起こし、周囲のゾンビに100ダメージを与える。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>狙撃エンドウ＋ハラペーニョ</color>

plants.name: エンドウ大将
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>狂暴なゾンビたちや強力な仲間たちに囲まれ、さらなる挑戦を求めて庭にやってきたエンドウ大将は、巨大なプレッシャーを感じていた。そして彼の気性はますます荒くなっていく…。しかし、遠距離から狂ったようにエンドウ豆を乱射するエンドウ大将のあまりの暴力性に、植物たちはいつも衝撃を受ける。ガトリングバタバタキノコはすでに彼の連絡先を聞くつもりでいるようだ。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ゾンビにエンドウ豆を発射し、低確率で大量の弾幕を撃つ！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>20×6/1.5秒
</color><color=red>必殺技：3×20/0.02秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>攻撃時、3%の確率でエンドウ豆の弾幕を発射する。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>狙撃エンドウ＋エンドウシューター</color>

plants.name: タイタンパンプキン要塞
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>かつて、二つのカボチャはサーカス入りを夢見ていた。しかし、磁力の暴走で合体してしまった彼らは、より偉大な使命を見出した。それは、決して突破されない盾となること。サーカスなんて後回しでいい。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>2タイルを同時に守れる！

<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>12000</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>チェリー爆弾やピエロ箱の爆発を受けると回復する。2タイルの植物の上にしか配置できない。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>ピエロのパンプキン＋磁石キノコ＋チェリーパンプキン＋ヒカマホウ（ヒカマホウを磁石キノコに配置）</color>

plants.name: ポテトキノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>「なあ、なんでナゲットシルームの頭って赤いんだ？」ポテトキノコは答えた——「おっと、その前にこっちから質問してもいいか？」</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>自分を増やせる！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>20/1.5秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>0秒後に同じマスに新しいポテトキノコを生成する。ただし、各ポテトキノコは1回しか増殖できない。倒されると、周囲のゾンビに300ダメージを与える。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>パフキノコ＋ジャガイモ地雷</color>

plants.name: ジリジリキノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>「なんでジリジリキノコって数回攻撃すると爆発するんだ？」彼はしんみりと答えた——「俺の攻撃は…命を燃やしてるんだよ…！」……なんて、実はただのサボり魔。数回攻撃するとやる気をなくし、最後はポテト花火で派手な“キノコ”マジックを披露する。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>耐久力を消費して強力な胞子を発射！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>600/3秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>1回攻撃するごとに耐久力を75消費する。植えてから20秒生存すると、赤い光が消え、攻撃力が90%減少する代わりに耐久力を消費しなくなる。倒されると、周囲のゾンビに600ダメージを与える。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>ビクビクキノコ＋ジャガイモ地雷</color>

plants.name: 毒臭キノコ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>青白い肌、壮大な大聖堂のような髪型、そして歪んだ笑顔——まるでおとぎ話の悪役を狙っているかのような姿の毒臭キノコ。だが皮肉なことに、彼がよく配役されるのはヴァンパイア役だ。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ゾンビに毒ガスを散布！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>20/1.5秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>攻撃するとゾンビに中毒ポイントを1つ付与する。また、ニンニクの特性を継承している。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>ガスキノコ＋ニンニク</color>

plants.name: 黒曜石のハラペーニョ
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>外は冷たく、中は燃えるように熱い。これが黒曜石のハラペーニョを表す他の植物の言葉だ。「この落ち着いた見た目に騙されるな。俺の爆発力は想像を超えるぞ」と彼はつぶやく。ちなみに、アイス作りも得意だ。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>氷キノコとハラペーニョの特性を併せ持つ！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>1800</color>
<color=#3D1400>耐久力：</color><color=red>32000</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>3秒ごとに最大耐久力の20%を失う。フィールドにいる間、すべての植物へのダメージを肩代わりする。倒れると、レーン内でハラペーニョ、全画面で氷キノコを発動。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>ハラペーニョ＋氷キノコ</color>

plants.name: タイタン巨顎
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>タイタン巨顎は「グルメキングコンテスト」の優勝者。10個の超級ガーグケーキを44秒で完食した。ただし、3秒はスタートの合図を聞き逃したせいで無駄にしたらしい。「次の大会があればぜひ呼んでくれ。庭の近くのビュッフェにはもう入れてもらえないんだ」と彼はインタビューで語った。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>接近したゾンビをすべて丸呑み！

<color=#3D1400>ダメージ：</color><color=red>即死</color>
<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>1.5タイル以内のゾンビをすべて丸呑みする（ただし、丸呑み無効のゾンビは除くが、通常のガーグチュアは含む）。消化時間は t=8+3×ln(ゾンビの合計耐久力)秒。参考値：：
ゾンビ - 24.8秒
バケツゾンビ - 29.9秒
超級ガーグチュア - 34秒
超級ガーグチュア×10体 - 41秒</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>チョンパー＋チョンパー＋チョンパー＋ヒカマホウ（中央のチョンパーにヒカマホウを配置）</color>

plants.name: 魅惑ブロバー
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>なぜ魅惑ブロバーはゾンビを引き戻すのか？ 植物たちは不思議に思っている。魅惑ブロバーはこう答える。「ブロバーはゾンビを向きと逆方向に吹き飛ばす。だから僕が催眠ゾンビを引き戻すのも自然なことさ！」</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>催眠（魅了）状態のゾンビを引き戻す！

<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>すべての魅了状態のゾンビを後方へ引き戻す。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>ヒプノキノコ＋ブロバー</color>

plants.name: 双子刃草
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>双子刃草の2つの頭はいつも口論している。一方は「回転攻撃こそ最強」と主張し、もう一方は「鋸刃を飛ばすのが最善」と譲らない。それでも彼らのコンビネーションは敵を切り裂く。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>近距離で斬撃攻撃、遠距離でも攻撃可能！

<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>前頭部は通常の刃草と同じ攻撃を行う。後頭部は全画面のゾンビをターゲットし、追尾＆貫通する刃を1.5秒ごとに発射（ダメージ：10）。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>刃草＋刃草</color>

plants.name: 爆木
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=#3D1400>爆木のアフロはリズムに合わせて弾む。それは彼だけが聞こえるビートなのかもしれない。彼のグルーヴが炎の創造力をかき立てるという者もいれば、単純にその派手なスタイルと爆発を楽しむ者もいる。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>一定数の弾を燃やすごとに誘導チェリードローンを生成し、ミニチェリー爆弾を直接ドローンに変換！

<color=#3D1400>スペシャル：</color><color=red>通過したエンドウ豆30個ごとに誘導チェリードローンを生成。また、通過したミニチェリー爆弾をチェリードローンに変換する。最大3体までのチェリードローンを維持可能。死亡時にチェリー爆弾の爆発を引き起こす。</color>
<color=#3D1400>融合レシピ：</color><color=red>炎木＋チェリー爆弾</color>

plants.name: 爆竹
plants.introduce: <size=36>
plants.info:
<size=36>ゾンビに向かって飛び込み、ダメージを与えて撃退する。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>300</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>植えられてから1秒後に直線状に飛行し、接触したゾンビを撃退しつつ、300の範囲ダメージを与える。オニゾンビに追加ダメージ。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>チェリー爆弾＋ハラペーニョ</color>
plants.cost: <size=36><color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>チェリー爆弾＋ハラペーニョ</color>

plants.name: 氷ウィード
plants.info:
<size=36>氷ウィードは上を歩くゾンビの動きを鈍らせる。

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20/秒</color>
<color=#0077b6>冷凍システム：</color><color=#8B0000>攻撃ごとに10冷凍ポイントを追加。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>スパイクウィード＋氷キノコ</color>
plants.cost: <size=36><color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>スパイクウィード＋氷キノコ</color>

plants.name: 悪臭ブロバー
plants.introduce: <size=36>
plants.info:
<size=36>悪臭ブロバーはゾンビを中毒状態にする。

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>画面上のすべてのゾンビに5中毒ポイントを付与し、「中毒」デバフを付与する。その持続時間を5秒延長し、さらにゾンビを別のレーンに移動させる。</color>
<color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ブロバー＋ニンニク</color>
plants.cost: <size=36><color=black>融合レシピ：</color><color=#8B0000>ニンニク＋ブロバー</color>

plants.name: Frostburn-wood
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"One input, one output. That's the rule." Frostburn-wood prided himself on his structured logic. "That's why I counteract 炎木's flames with pure, unyielding frost." But put them together? Things got... messy. Fire and ice, heat and cold—sometimes they balanced, sometimes they clashed, and sometimes, well... physics just gave up.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can turn normal peas into snow peas or polar ice peas.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Turns the normal peas that pass through into snow peas, and the snow peas that pass through into polar ice peas for ×2 damage and ×2 Cryo points.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>炎木＋氷キノコ</color>

plants.name: スターパフキノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>スターパフキノコ would be all over Dave's house, on the floor, on the table, on the dinner plate - Dave always forgot about the Doc's reminder - who cares, Daisy loved the gummy vitamins anyway!</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A small mushroom that shoots mini-stars.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20×5/2.25秒 (Equivalent to the DPS of 10 エンドウシューター) </color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スターフルーツ＞パフキノコ</color>

plants.name: ヒマワリの鉢
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"What do you guys think 'flower pot' means, huh?" ヒマワリの鉢 snapped. "Is it a pot for growing flowers? Or is it a pot that is a flower? Either way, let's get one thing straight—I am a flowerpot. End of discussion."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates extra Sun for you.

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>15/25秒</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ヒマワリ＞植木鉢</color>

plants.name: 光の傘
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Beyond the fog, she watches, a prophet untouched by mortal blindness. When God willed light into existence, she stepped forth. "By decree of the Almighty, I have come to the land of Seth. The fire looms, but with this sacred light, I shall protect the lost from its grasp."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>It can dispel fog and block bullets.

<color=black>Energy Limit: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Search & Light Range: </color><color=#8B0000>3×3</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：<color=#99582a>光システム</color></color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Provides 1 光レベル and dispels the fog for the surrounding 3×3 tiles.
<color=black>•</color> Consumes Energy to block projectiles. Each block consumes Energy based on the damage of the projectile (excluding basketballs).
<color=black>•</color> Restores (25 x 光レベル) Energy every second, pausing to rest for 5秒 when it is completely exhausted.
<color=black>•</color> Reduces Energy first to absorb damage, where 5 Energy = 1 Toughness.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>プランタン＋傘の葉</color>

plants.name: 傘のトゲ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>傘のトゲ just dropped his latest song, "Prickly サボテン." With a hopeful glint in his eyes, he mused, "Maybe one day, people will like me as much as they love roses. I know it won't happen overnight, but I'll keep trying my best."</color>
plants.info: <size=36>Can shoot down flying zombies and repel airships.
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>サボテン＋傘の葉</color>

plants.name: 銀のヒマワリ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Who says sunflowers only bask in the sun? 銀のヒマワリ has a knack for more than just growing—she's a master silversmith! With techniques passed down from her brewer, she forges dazzling silverware and jewelry, each piece shimmering with history. As they say, "A brewer's legacy lives on, and elegance never goes unnoticed."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates Sun faster.

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/15秒</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ヒマワリ＋マリーゴールド</color>

plants.name: 金のヒマワリ
plants.introduce: Standing guard over a trophy had been so last season. Now? She was ready to shine—and not just under the sun. "Look, I love a good tan, but let's be real... I was made for the fight!"
plants.info:
<size=36>Generates Sun faster... faster!

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Every 10秒, 50 Sun is accumulated, up to 10,000.
<color=black>•</color> The Sun limit in the level is adjusted to 50,000.
<color=black>•</color> The excess will be stored in the available 金のヒマワリs.
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Costs 1000コイン; makes all 金のヒマワリs release their stored Sun.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>強化コスト：</color><color=#8B0000>3000コイン; each existing 金のヒマワリ will double the cost.</color>

plants.name: 氷ナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>氷ナッツ huffed as he hit the ground again. "Do the janitors ever remember to put up 'Caution: Slippery Floor' signs!?" he grumbled. But in his frustration, he failed to realize something very concerning—he was shrinking.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Zombies that bite him are slowed down.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Zombies that chew it will be slowed down and will accrue Cryo points. 氷ナッツs can be upgraded to Frost Tall-nuts using a Fertilizer.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋氷キノコ</color>

plants.name: パンプキン地雷
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Once a chip shop owner, パンプキン地雷 had a simple business model: cut the fries in half but keep the price the same. The customers disagreed. Now in the Garden, he's offering a different kind of deal—one that ends with a bang. Yet, for some reason, people still bring up his old menu.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A shorter パンプキン.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles). However, non-"short" plants inside it will be hit. Each time it is damaged, a small explosion will occur, causing 500 points of damage to zombies.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ジャガイモ地雷＞パンプキン</color>

plants.name: 破滅サボテン
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>破滅サボテン is a firm believer in the Art of War of Plants: bide your time, strike hard, and leave nothing standing. Whether it's zombies shambling through the battlefield or armored rats scurrying for cover, one well-placed explosion is all it takes to turn the tide.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fires destructive thorns.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>40/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Each attack has a 0% starting chance of unleashing an Ultimate attack. If it fails, the chance is increased by 5% for the next attack.</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Shoots a large number of thorns forward, which can hit airborne units.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>サボテン＋破滅キノコ</color>

plants.name: 破滅チョンパー
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>In the チョンパー's Big Eater Championship, 破滅チョンパー was a force to be reckoned with—until he took things a little too far. "He didn't just eat his cake—he incinerated mine!" a fellow contestant recalled. Unsurprisingly, he was disqualified for excessive destruction.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Devours a zombie to produce a Doom explosion.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>即死 (Devour)</color>
<color=black>Chewing Time: </color><color=#8B0000>40秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Each time it successfully bites a zombie, a 破滅キノコ explosion is released, causing a crater to appear in front of it.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>チョンパー＋破滅キノコ</color>

plants.name: 炎ガスキノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>As the head chef of the restaurant, performing a fiery dragon dance on the teppan is a must-have show for every dinner. But every time, at least one guest ends up getting burned. Word has it that to make up for it, the 炎ガスキノコ gave them an encore performance.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Flamethrower incarnated.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>33/1.5秒 (Piercing)</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Deals fire damage and inflicts 炎上デバフ.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：ガスキノコ＋ハラペーニョ<color=#8B0000></color>

plants.name: 破滅エンドウ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>破滅エンドウ and Frenzy-shroom are great friends—one's a hothead, the other’s laid-back. But together, they're the perfect pair. "We may be opposites, but we bring out the best in each other."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A damage-scaling エンドウシューター and the perfect partner for Frenzy-shroom.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>40/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Damage increases by 1 each attack, up to 60. If a Frenzy-shroom is planted 1 tile behind it, 破滅エンドウ gains Frenzy-shroom's attack speed and Frenzy-shroom gains 破滅エンドウ's attack damage.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>エンドウシューター＋破滅キノコ</color>

plants.name: 光の鉢
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The 光の鉢 always emits a warm glow, so it is often used as a nightlight. If you look closely, you will also find a small inscription on the edge of the pot that says, "Firefly habitat, please do not disturb."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A 植木鉢 that can be used as a small プランタン, providing 1 光レベル for its tile.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Dispels a small patch of fog, providing 1 光レベル for its tile.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>植木鉢＞プランタン</color>

plants.name: メロンランチャー
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Holding your breath, focusing, and striking with precision!" メロンランチャー is very patient, always waiting for the perfect moment to make a move. If you ask him how he manages to stay calm, he will always mention his mentor, the Imitator.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A big shroom with coiling vines that lob watermelons after charging.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>120/4秒</color>
<color=black>Range: 4 tiles ahead</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Charges when not attacking for at least 4.5秒 to increase damage to (1＋charge time × 0.5) times the base damage. Maximum charge time: 30秒.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ガスキノコ＋スイカパルト</color>

plants.name: 火花木
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After graduating from university, 火花木 returned to the mountainous region to teach. "From the moment I received an education, I understood that knowledge is meant to be passed on like a 'spark'!" The flame of knowledge ignited the students' enthusiasm and also the zombies.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A 炎木 shaped like a スターフルーツ, ignites star projectiles.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Ignites passing star-shaped projectiles (except thorn stars and jack-in-the-box stars), adding 20 damage and removing their other traits. Ignited stars do splash damage in a similar way to ignited peas.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>炎木＋スターフルーツ</color>

plants.name: 辛いスターフルーツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>辛いスターフルーツ silently glares, while the other スターフルーツs keep their distance: "He looks too scary." But 辛いスターフルーツ doesn't care; he is focused on creating an ultimate piece of art. He firmly believes that when he finally blooms, everyone will take notice.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Explodes and releases high-damage spicy stars.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>600 × 25</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Does not trigger the ハラペーニョ effect Immediately when fused. Explodes instead 1秒 after fusion, releasing ハラペーニョ effect and exploding into 25 spicy stars.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ハラペーニョ＋スターフルーツ</color>

plants.name: 破滅木
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Whenever someone asks 破滅木, "What's the secret to grilling?" he just silently collects and repurposes the embers. It's not that he's indifferent; if he spoke, you'd just end up with a face full of ash.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>破滅木 keeps burning even after a 破滅キノコ explosion and it takes burning to the next level.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> When its Ember value is 0, it behaves the same as 炎木.
<color=black>•</color> When the Ember value is not 0, turns peas and regular ignited peas into ember peas, with +30 damage and a no falloff 1/3 splash damage. Ember peas inflict the Ember debuff.
<color=black>•</color> Can also use 10 Ember values to strengthen 破滅エンドウs or Boom-shroom projectiles, ×2 or ×6 their damage respectively, and to enhance their splash effect to be the same as the large bullet of doom.</color>
<color=#7303fc>Ember value: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Initial: 60, Maximum: 60, 1 point is lost per second.
<color=black>•</color> Gains 60 points for every 60 projectiles ignited, 30 points when affected by 破滅キノコ explosions, and 10 points when any zombie within a 5×5 area dies with the Ember debuff. 
<color=black>•</color> Ember debuff will be cleared by cold/frozen/poisoned status and coexists with the 炎上デバフ.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>破滅キノコ＋炎木</color>

plants.name: スケアレスパンプキン
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Trust me, it's very safe inside." スケアレスパンプキン gently reassures ビクビクキノコ, as the built-in phonograph and fairy tale books help them no longer worry about the zombie horde.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A パンプキン with the color of the ビクビクキノコ. Scaredy plants inside the パンプキン will not be afraid.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Scaredy plants inside the パンプキン will not be afraid (Frenzy-shroom and Gatling Frenzy-shroom will not self-destruct).</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ビクビクキノコ＞パンプキン</color>

plants.name: 星キノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Guys in the distance, no matter who you are, except for the circus people, don't come over!" The 星キノコ, trembled, "I, I am very powerful!" He kept attacking, thinking that this would scare off those with ill intentions, but he didn't notice that his bullets weren't even hitting straight ahead.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>星キノコ shoots stars faster and in 5 directions, but also gets frightened more often.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20×5/0.75秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Attacks in the same way as スターフルーツ, but become afraid if there is a zombie in its range.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スターフルーツ＋ビクビクキノコ</color>

plants.name: スクワッシュ パンプキン
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>スクワッシュ パンプキン has never met a match in arm wrestling, has diligently learned various techniques for skipping stones, and is very good at selecting stones—his only bane is that he is very afraid of water and can only watch others skip stones.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>The cozy nest of スクワッシュes. When there are specific plants in the shell, it can spawn スクワッシュes.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>225</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Does nothing in Water Lanes.
<color=black>•</color> スクワッシュ plants in スクワッシュ パンプキンs lose their ability to detect enemies.
<color=black>•</color> When there are スクワッシュ or スクワッシュwood plants in スクワッシュ パンプキン, a baby スクワッシュ with 1/8 damage (minimum 225) and a maximum jump distance of 1.5 Tiles is spawned. It disappears after 6 jumps and regenerates after 3秒.
<color=black>•</color> Baby スクワッシュes spawned from 地獄のスクワッシュの炎木 releases the ハラペーニョ effect when it lands.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スクワッシュ＞パンプキン</color>

plants.name: ポップコーンパルト
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"The results of this experiment: dense planting is not conducive to plant growth, and the corn ears have obviously shrunk." Dave bent down, took out a magnifying glass, and looked at the ポップコーンパルト, "Not suitable for making corn rolls anymore." ポップコーンパルト said angrily, "The results of this experiment show that the concentrated ones are all the essence!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A tiny カーネルパルト, with a chance to throw a small butter that shrinks zombies.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20/3秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Has a 25% chance to throw a small butter that deals 40 damage, which shrinks the size and health of non-shrunken zombies by a factor of 0.7, otherwise it will be stunned for 1.5秒, while Imps are killed instantly. Prioritizes zombies that are not shrunken.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>カーネルパルト＞パフキノコ</color>

plants.name: 傘のホバーリーフ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After resigning, 傘のホバーリーフ embarked on a journey around the world. "Sailing with the wind to the places your heart desires, isn't that very romantic?" He compiled his experiences into a book, which received praise from all walks of life.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A smaller floating 傘の葉 that can only protect the 1 Tile below.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Hovering plant. He shares the same traits as 傘の葉, but can only protect the plant right below it.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>傘の葉＋ブロバー</color>

plants.name: ヒプノパンプキン
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Many plants were curious about how ヒプノパンプキン had only subdued one zombie. "I'm a dedicated person, so of course I need a dedicated zombie," ヒプノパンプキン said, scratching his head.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ヒプノパンプキン makes a hypnotized zombie stay by your side.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Has a 4% chance to hypnotize zombie eating him. Forces up to 1 hypnotized zombie to stay in his tile, and use that zombie as a shield first when under attack.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ヒプノキノコ＞パンプキン</color>

plants.name: 傘の殻
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>傘の殻 is the trendiest hairstylist in the garden, known for its ability to create cool hairstyles on hard nut shells. Although the lifespan of this hairstyle is short, it doesn't stop people from loving it—and the opening of the sixth nut hair salon chain.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>傘の殻 has the traits of both his fusion ingredients.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Has the characteristics of 傘の葉 and ウォールナッツ. Can repel approaching zombies, dealing 40 damage every time.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋傘の葉</color>

plants.name: 爆弾傘
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>爆弾傘 has changed to a new hairstyle, making it look even more rebellious and irritable, like a delinquent wandering the streets. But don't be fooled by its appearance; it actually has a soft heart and even helps the barber clean up the fallen leaves.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>When repelling, it causes small-scale cherry explosions, and harnesses the power of cherry explosions to protect surrounding plants.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>600</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Inherits the traits of 傘の葉.
<color=black>•</color> Repel approaching zombies and release a small-range cherry explosion with a damage of 300. 
<color=black>•</color> Immune to explosive basketballs.
<color=black>•</color> For every instance of Cherry-fused defensive plants or チェリーの鉢 healing through cherry explosions in the surrounding 3×3 area, it gains 1 level of energy, up to 100 level. 
<color=black>•</color> 爆弾傘 uses 2 levels to absorb any damage in the surrounding 3×3 area.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>チェリー爆弾＋傘の葉</color>

plants.name: クノロエンドウ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Nothing has been born earlier than the universe, and nothing will perish slower than the universe. But for life, his/her body is not as enduring as the death of a star; his/her spirit is even more eternal than the universe. Cherish the present, seize the future, even if it's just for a day or two, that is still a mayfly's life." — "Chronicles"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A エンドウシューター with the power to warp space and time, firing neutron peas that inflict the chronoshift effect, erasing every trace of the target from the time continuum.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Attacks deal no damage but apply chronoshift for 1.5秒, or extend the duration by 1秒 if the target is already affected. Deals only 100 damage to Mini-bosses.</color>
<color=#00008B>Chronoshift: </color><color=#8B0000>Zombies under this effect receive a countdown of (HP / 30) seconds, after which they are instantly erased. If the effect ends early, they take 30 × (elapsed second) points worth of damage.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>クノロコア＞エンドウシューター</color>

plants.name: カーネルモーフ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"The elderly also need to learn to keep up with the times," the カーネルモーフ said, "This new force of magnetism has truly opened my eyes." Of course, there is a small problem; it always makes the neighbors think I'm a scrap collector.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>The カーネルモーフ can fuse with metal objects and changes into the corresponding form based on the type.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>60/3秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Has a 25% chance to throw a magnetic butter with 80 damage, and stuns the target for 4秒.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>カーネルパルト＋磁石キノコ</color>

plants.name: ポータルパルト
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"You've seen Interstellar, right?" ポータルパルト often brings up his favorite sci-fi movie. "The male protagonist drives into a cornfield at the beginning and then pilots a spaceship into a black hole at the end. There must be some connection between the two!" ポータルパルト insists.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ポータルパルト has a chance to throw a neutron butter that generates a mini black hole.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/3秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Metal Plant. Has a 25% chance to throw a neutron butter with 100 damage, which generates a mini black hole when it hits. The mini black hole massively slows zombies down and explodes after 2秒, causing 100 damage and reducing the countdown of zombies with the chronoshift effect by 30秒.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>クノロコア＞カーネルモーフ</color>

plants.name: Bolt-pult
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Bolt-pult has been considering buying some anti-rust paint lately, as his butter always ends up with a bit of a rusty taste, which seriously hinders his ability to make butter cakes for his brothers. "Butter with a rusty taste might only be good for fighting zombies."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Bolt-pult throws Iron kernels or Iron butter that is miraculously effective against Type 1 armor.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/3秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Metal plant. Has a 25% chance to throw an Iron butter with 100 damage, which stuns the target for 4秒 and removes their Type 1 armor instantly.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>Bucket/Screen Door＞カーネルモーフ</color>

plants.name: Frozen Cherry
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The plants all say that Frozen Cherry is calm, introverted, and taciturn. "I occasionally confide in the other cherries," Frozen Cherry said, "they call it 'explosive news.'"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cherry mold made of ice, he absorbs cherry projectiles from plants to generate チェリー爆弾 seedpackets.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Absorbing cherries, ignited cherries, and explosive cherries grants 1, 2, and 10 energy points respectively. For every 100 energy points collected, a チェリー爆弾 seed packet is generated. Upon death, unleashes a チェリー爆弾 explosion and freezes all zombies in its range for 10秒.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>チェリー爆弾＋氷キノコ</color>

plants.name: Dormant-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Using magnetism to confine nuclear energy is a topic that Dormant-shroom has been researching for a long time. This is a difficult task, and timing is crucial; numerous laboratories of his are now in ruins. However, it seems that the zombies are more eager for him to succeed than the plants.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Dormant-shroom is stabilized by magnetic force and can be fused with metal to transform into a corresponding form.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Does not explode until further fusion.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>破滅キノコ＋磁石キノコ</color>

plants.name: Doomwarp-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Time travel personnel have passed through, complete. The time tunnel has exited the target world, complete. Observed impact is within the expected range, complete. Proceed to the next step, destroy the tunnel to prevent use by others or organizations." — "Time Planning Bureau"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Doomwarp-shroom possesses the power of hyperspace bending. Its explosion inflicts chronoshift to any foe unfortunate enough to be caught in its effects.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Cremator) </color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Inherits the traits of 破滅キノコ. Explosion reduces the countdown of zombies with the chronoshift effect by 30秒.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>クノロコア＞Dormant-shroom</color>

plants.name: クロノナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Other plants often hear クロノナッツ recount the mysteries on his adventures — like a Sphinx with a zombie’s head, a minivan that only beeps, and the 1001 kinds of machines developed by GFishtus Corps.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A ウォールナッツ with spacetime powers. He has a chance to teleport back attackers and can rewind health once when near death.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> 25% chance to teleport biters to the far right of the same row (10秒 cooldown)
<color=black>•</color> When taking lethal damage, rewinds HP to what it was 3秒 ago and becomes invulnerable for 3秒 (single use ability)</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>クノロコア＞ウォールナッツ</color>

plants.name: エンドウドローン
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>エンドウドローン sees himself as the future of garden warfare. "Support-type aerial drones — a weapon of a new era." Unfortunately, he has little time to promote his ideas — he works three jobs to pay off his soilless cultivation loan.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A peashooter drone that enhances firepower when coordinating with straight-shooting plants below.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Hovering plant. If the shooter directly beneath it attacks faster than once every 1.5秒, エンドウドローン syncs its attack rate to match.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>エンドウシューター＋ブロバー</color>

plants.name: スプルース刃草射手
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>In the snowy plains, it’s said that the taller the Christmas tree, the happier the next year will be. So who can place the star on top? That's a job for the スプルース刃草射手 and his unmatched aim.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fires piercing saws that leave spinning spruce needles on zombies.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/3秒; 1×75/1.5秒 (Spinning spruce needle)</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.
<color=black>•</color> Projectiles pierce once (including ice blocks) and leave spinning pine needles on the first zombie hit.
<color=black>•</color> Spinning needles deal 1 damage every 0.02秒 for 1.5秒.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スプルース射手＋刃草</color>

plants.name: 水滴刃草
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After equipping a high-pressure water jet, 水滴刃草 greatly improved her cutting efficiency. But there's one downside — flowing water is hard to come by on the snowy plains.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Cold-resistant, deals more damage compared to 刃草 and applies chill when there are ice charges.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>8/0.02秒</color>
<color=#0077b6>氷結システム：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1/1/15 ice charge when affected by snowball/snow trident/氷キノコ respectively.
<color=black>•</color> With ice charges, attacks deal double damage, inflict Deep Chill and add 1 Cryo Point, but have an 1/9 chance to use up a charge. </color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Immune to freeze from Snowballs.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>刃草＋水滴アロエ</color>

plants.name: 水滴射手
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Can an archer compete without a bow? Droplet Shooter shrugs: "It's just waterbending."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Bends and shoots water orbs; consumes ice charges to launch ice blocks instead.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>50/1.5秒</color>
<color=#0077b6>氷結システム：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1/1/15 ice charges when affected by snowball/snow trident/氷キノコ respectively.
<color=black>•</color> Uses 1 ice charge to shoot an ice block with double the damage that inflicts Deep Chill and adds 40 Cryo points, dealing ×4 damage to Frozen zombies.</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スプルース射手＋水滴アロエ</color>

plants.name: スーパースプルース
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>スーパースプルース is stern, cold, and strict—perfect traits for a top-tier coach.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shoots spinning hydro-needles that cling to zombies. Consumes ice charges to shoot spinning cryo-needles instead.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>5×75/1.5秒</color>
<color=#0077b6>氷結システム：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1/1/15 ice charges when affected by snowball/snow trident/氷キノコ respectively.
<color=black>•</color> Spinning hydro-needles deal 5 Damage per 0.02秒 and last 1.5秒.
<color=black>•</color> Uses 1 ice charge to shoot spinning cryo-needles with double the damage that inflict Deep Chill and adds 1 Cryo points, dealing ×4 damage to Frozen zombies.</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スプルース射手＋水滴アロエ＋刃草</color>

plants.name: 蓮スプルース
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"People talk about iron trees blooming or old trees flowering," 蓮スプルース murmurs. "But I’m neither iron nor old. I just... never mind." He stops talking to admire his blossoms.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spruce with 雪蓮 blooms and a reduced cost for healing nearby plants.

<color=#0077b6>氷結システム：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1 ice charge passively every 10秒.
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1/1/60 ice charges when affected by snowball/snow trident/blizzard respectively.
<color=black>•</color> Awakens at 5 charges, firing an ice orb that deals 100 damage with 3×3 splash (no falloff) and inflicts Deep Chill.
<color=black>•</color> While awake, consumes 1 charge per sec to heal a 3×3 area by 50 HP. Returns to sleep when charge is exhausted.</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スプルース射手＋雪蓮</color>

plants.name: 刃草蓮
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Her bunny ears are so cute!" "She’s adorable even when asleep!" "Like a rose!" 刃草蓮 sleepily swats away the fans that lack a sense of personal space—yes, she's thorny like a rose, but that hasn’t stopped the admiration.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A steel-leaved Lotus that heals nearby plants and gives them shields.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Inherits 雪蓮 traits. Healing also grants 50 points of Shield to each plant. See 刃草 for shield mechanic explanation.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>雪蓮＋刃草</color>

plants.name: スプルース小松炉草
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>スプルース小松炉草 always carries dry spruce leaves. He claims they're excellent "green" fuel—flammable and easy to collect. Right now, he's sun-drying a batch.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>An upgraded 小松炉草 that absorbed スプルース射手, with an expanded protection range.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Inherits the traits of 小松炉草 but with range expanded to 3×3. Reverts to regular 小松炉草 after 210秒.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>小松炉草＋スプルース射手</color>

plants.name: 刃小松炉草
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Using potassium as fuel not only provides ample heat, but also gives off beautiful flame colors," 刃小松炉草 enthusiastically explains. "And this fan, modified from a circular saw, helps blow hot air right to you." As a top employee of the snowfield sauna, he's always committed to providing the best service.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>An upgraded 小松炉草 that absorbed 刃草, with an expanded protection range.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Inherits the traits of 小松炉草 but with range expanded to 3×3. Reverts to regular 小松炉草 after 120秒.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>小松炉草＋刃草</color>

plants.name: 蓮小松炉草
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I was born extraordinary," claims 蓮小松炉草. He thinks he glows from phosphorus fire — but actually, it’s just fireflies hiding from the cold inside him.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>An upgraded 小松炉草 that absorbed 雪蓮, with an expanded protection range.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Inherits the traits of 小松炉草 but with range expanded to 3×3. Reverts to regular 小松炉草 after 60秒.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>小松炉草＋雪蓮</color>

plants.name: アロエ小松炉草
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>アロエ小松炉草 has upgraded its air system to better regulate temperature in small areas. The only problem: the water dripping from the condenser tends to freeze quickly in the snowfield.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>An upgraded 小松炉草 that absorbed 水滴アロエ, with an expanded protection range.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Inherits the traits of 小松炉草 but with range expanded to 3×3. Reverts to regular 小松炉草 after 90秒.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>小松炉草＋水滴アロエ</color>

plants.name: 蓮アロエ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Doctor 蓮アロエ is the most beloved young doctor in the hospital. It's not just due to his diligence and skill — it might also be his mustache-like leaves. After all, patients tend to trust older-looking doctors.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Throws aloe extract upwards; upon falling, it heals surrounding plants and temporarily boosts their attack speed.

<color=#0077b6>氷結システム：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1 ice charge passively every 5秒.
<color=black>•</color> Gains 1/1/15/60 ice charges when affected by snowball/snow trident/氷キノコ/blizzard respectively.
<color=black>•</color> Every 5秒, consumes 5 charges to heal all plants in a 3×3 area for 50 HP and boost their attack speed by 30% for 5秒.</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>
融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>水滴アロエ＋雪蓮</color>

plants.name: 氷スクワッシュ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>To tame its hot temper, 氷スクワッシュ locked itself in the freezer for three days and nights. Now it keeps the mood ice-cold — so cold that the other plants don't dare say a word to 'set it off.' As for zombies… let's just say, no one's allowed to 'break the ice' with it.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>スクワッシュ imbued with freezing power.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Upon landing deals 600 damage to zombies in a 3×3 area and freezes them for 4s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スクワッシュ＋氷キノコ</color>

plants.name: ヒプノスクワッシュ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I've finally realized zombies really are our friends,"said ヒプノスクワッシュ, who quickly joined the Zombie Buddy Club. The only problem: his extremely radical way of showing friendship turned all the other members into conservative ones.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>スクワッシュ that overwhelms zombies with charm.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Hypnotizes the zombies he crushes, deals 1800 damage instead if the zombie cannot be hypnotized.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スクワッシュ＋ヒプノキノコ</color>

plants.name: ヒプノニンニク
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>ヒプノニンニク doesn't quite fit in with the rest of the ニンニク family — he's far too popular for that. Loved and envied by his kin, he pays them no mind. All he wants is to pull his hat low over his eyes and enjoy a peaceful nap whenever he can.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ニンニク with a shroomy hypno-cap mushroom on its head.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles).
<color=black>•</color> Causes hypnotized zombies that touch him to switch lanes.
<color=black>•</color> When bitten, hypnotizes the attacker, forces it to switch lanes, then reverts to regular ニンニク.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ニンニク＋ヒプノキノコ</color>

plants.name: Hypno Mine
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Hypno Mine isn't one for rushing. It believes every zombie deserves a second chance — preferably before it explodes. Contradictory? Maybe. But it's perfectly in line with its five personal principles, which it refuses to share.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ジャガイモ地雷 with an explosive charm.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles).
<color=black>•</color> Hypnotizes the zombies exploded, deals 1800 damage instead if the zombie cannot be hypnotized.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ジャガイモ地雷＋ヒプノキノコ</color>

plants.name: Tangle Mine
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Originally a naval mine tossed ashore by a powerful tsunami, this fella now lies half-buried in the soil. Though the kelp outside has withered, the explosives inside remain deadly.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ジャガイモ地雷 tangled with kelp.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>即死 (Drown)</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles).
<color=black>•</color> When armed, insta-kills the first approaching zombie and triggers a ジャガイモ地雷 explosion.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>もつれたケルプ＞ジャガイモ地雷</color>

plants.name: ケルプ地雷
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Beware, ships — reefs ahead!" Tangle Mine serves as the river's safety officer, signaling danger with a red light. He does a solid job, since wherever he appears, danger is never far behind.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>もつれたケルプ that's as explosive as ジャガイモ地雷.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>即死 (Drown)</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles).
<color=black>•</color> 即死s the first approaching zombie and deals 600 damage to zombies in a 3×3 area.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ジャガイモ地雷＞もつれたケルプ</color>

plants.name: Firnurse
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Firnurse brings warmth and life to the frozen wilderness. Despite his odd appearance, the local kids adore him. "Sugar cube, anyone?" he offers cheerfully. "Helps keep the heat in!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Stable high-temp 小松炉草 that periodically provides charges or healing to nearby plants.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits of 小松炉草, with a 3×3 protection range.
<color=black>•</color> Cannot be placed near other 小松炉草s.
<color=black>•</color> Provides 1 ice charge to protected Snow plants every 3s.
<color=black>•</color> Heals protected plants for 50 HP every 15秒.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>小松炉草＋蓮アロエ</color>

plants.name: 炎ナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Always wear a smile"—that’s rule number one for 炎ナッツ, the ever-patient restaurant server. Even when half-melted 氷ナッツ is slipping all over the floor yelling about the lack of a 'Wet Floor' sign, he just keeps smiling. And sizzling.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Spicy-flavored nut that scorches biters.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Deals 20 damage to biters and inflicts 炎上デバフ.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋ハラペーニョ</color>

plants.name: 破滅ナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>破滅ナッツ is a huge fan of Batman. He rarely speaks, preferring to lurk in shadows and only shows up at the occasional Comic-cons. One time, he startled McCornics in a hallway. "When did 破滅キノコ get... this bulky?" the old corn muttered.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ウォールナッツ with nuclear potential. 

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to non-physical explosions. 
<color=black>•</color> Prevents 破滅キノコ Zombies in a 3×3 area from exploding. 
<color=black>•</color> Heals for 100 HP when a zombie with Ember debuff dies in a 5×5 area.
<color=black>•</color> Triggers 破滅キノコ effect on death.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋破滅キノコ</color>

plants.name: スパインケルプ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>スパインケルプ always felt like the runt of the spikeweed family—small, unnoticeable, and half-submerged. The others tried to cheer him up: "Hey, at least you're still more popular than that prickly old スパイクナッツ."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>スパイクウィード but aquatic and tangly.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20/1秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Attacks add 1 Tangle Value. Takes 10 damage every time he attacks a vehicle.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スパイクウィード＞もつれたケルプ</color>

plants.name: もつれたウィード
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Founder of the now-famous aquatic foot massage empire, もつれたウィード has redefined spa therapy. With branches in every biome and a new line of vehicular massage lanes, business is booming—especially with traffic this bad.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>スパイクウィード that tangles zombies even on land.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20/1秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Attacks add 1 land Tangle Value (1/3 the efficacy of aquatic Tangle Value).</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>もつれたケルプ＞スパイクウィード</color>

plants.name: Doomplate-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Boom! A reality-defying burst of high-speed nuclear fission tears zombies apart, breaking down their atoms and rearranging them into the most stable form known to plantkind: iron. "Why iron buckets?" Doomplate-shroom pauses, then replies, "Because I was born that way."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Powerful 破滅キノコ that turns the ashes from his explosion into Buckets.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>3240 (Cremator)</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Every zombie he kills drops a Bucket.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>Bucket/Screen Door＞Dormant-shroom</color>

plants.name: Potato-spreader
plants.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>Potato-spreader loves playing tricks underground. It shoots out surprises not once, not twice, but thrice—like a cheeky prankster with a never-ending stash of boom. Watch your step, or you might get a triple whammy that’ll blow your boots off.

- Written by Mrs. Draco</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Potato-spreader resurfaces after exploding and fires potatoes across three lanes.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>30×3/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles).
<color=black>•</color> Attacks faster as zombies get closer (down to 0.5秒 per attack).
<color=black>•</color> When armed, explodes on contact, dealing 5400 damage, knocks back for 1 tile and retreats into the ground.
<color=black>•</color>Re-emerges 15秒 after exploding. Explodes and disappears immediately upon contact with vehicles.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ジャガイモ地雷＋スリーピーター</color>

plants.name: 光のチョンパー
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>They say 光のチョンパー has never gone hungry—not once. Every chomp lands a juicy zombie. He even published a book sharing his secrets: "Wiggle... wiggle... zombies love a gentle glow." — From his work Lantern.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Lures in zombies to snack on with his lophos.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>即死 (Devour)</color>
<color=black>Digestion Time: </color><color=#8B0000>40秒</color>
<color=#99582a>光システム：</color><color=#8B0000> Each 光レベル reduces digest time by 10秒 to a minimum of 10秒.</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Upon successful digestion, pulls a nearby zombie from adjacent lanes to its lane.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>チョンパー＋プランタン</color>

plants.name: Doombox-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Hey clowny!" the zombies jeer. Doombox-shroom just glances their way in silence. He doesn’t need to argue: his masterpiece will speak for itself. Too bad none of them will be around to see how it ends.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>破滅キノコ with enhanced explosive powers able to cause chain explosions.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>3240 (Cremator)</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>For every zombie eliminated, creates a Jack-in-the-Box explosion that deals 1800 damage at its position.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>Jack-in-the-Box＞Dormant-shroom</color>

plants.name: チェリーの鉢
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>チェリーの鉢 would rather give up her pay at the Zen Garden than be mistaken for a plant."Those lunatics can't get real cherries, so they're out here trying to eat anything cherry-flavored!" Just talking about it makes her shudder.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A pot with a passion for cherry explosions, using them to heal the plant on her own tile and briefly empower cherry-type shooters.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to cherry explosions.
<color=black>•</color> Heals the plant on herself by 20 HP when affected by cherry explosions.
<color=black>•</color> While healing, also grants an 1-second attack speed boost (30%) to cherry shooting plants.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>チェリー爆弾＞植木鉢</color>

plants.name: チェリードローン
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>チェリードローン always cares about appearances—whether or not anyone's watching. Ground or air, if you mess up his hair, you’ll get blasted. Hard.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A cheeky cherry delinquent that floats through the air and dive-bombs zombies in style.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>300</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Every 15秒, targets one zombie in a 3×5 area and dive-bombs them, causing a cherry-style explosion in a 1-tile radius.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>チェリー爆弾＋ブロバー</color>

plants.name: Sunrise-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A seasoned sunlight banker, Sunrise-shroom offers high interest on your deposits."You chose a time deposit," he says sternly to a frustrated 双子太陽ナッツ. "Withdrawals aren't allowed just yet."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A visionary sun producer that absorbs and multiplies nearby sun, paying out in bursts.

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/20秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Absorbs dropped Sun within a 5×5 area, multiplies their value by ×1.3, and stores them.
<color=black>•</color> Releases as much Sun as possible in batches of 25 along with the next production.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ヒマワリ＋ガスキノコ</color>

plants.name: Sunny-shroom
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Sunny-shroom's been working on a new breathing method to quickly vent all that awful sunlight. But… "Ahh! Zombies!!" And just like that, he's curled up, trembling, forgetting everything. As for the breathing method? He'll figure it out when the zombies walk away.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A timid sun producer that tries to work faster until it panics.

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/25秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Production interval gradually shortens to 10秒.
<color=black>•</color> Cowers in fear when zombies approach, resetting interval back to 25秒 and producing 25 Sun immediately.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ヒマワリ＋ビクビクキノコ</color>

plants.name: スプルースバリスタ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Pulling a giant ballista is exhausting, so even スプルースバリスタ needs a vacation. Thanks to Astro-nuts help, he found a job in another world: Helping to launch angry avians at some very green, very smug pigs.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fires giant spruce bolts that pierce through zombies and detonate with a short delay.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/3秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
