<color=black>•</color> Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.
<color=black>•</color> Bolts pierce up to 2 times (can pierce ice) and explode 0.3s after hitting a zombie, dealing AoE damage in a small area.</color>
plants.cost:
<size=36>コスト：<color=#8B0000>300</color>
クールタイム：<color=#8B0000>50秒</color>

plants.name: 破滅ヒマワリ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Garden games sometimes come down to pure luck. That's when 破滅ヒマワリ steps up."Why always me?" "Because you're destined. Or doomed."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A ヒマワリ that plants Doom-spores around herself, which grow and detonate remotely.

<color=black>Sun Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/25秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Every 50秒, plants one Doom-spore randomly in a 3×3 area around herself.
<color=black>•</color> Doom-spores take 30秒 to grow and once mature, if a zombie enters their blast radius, they detonate like a 破滅キノコ.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ヒマワリ＋破滅キノコ</color>

plants.name: Doom-spore
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Quietly growing on the lawn, Doom-spore hums the lullaby taught by 破滅ヒマワリ, dreaming of becoming a rising sun... and of no longer being mistaken for a rusty bolt.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A dormant spore radiating destructive power — just give it some time.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Takes 30秒 to grow and once mature, if a zombie enters his blast radius, detonates like a 破滅キノコ.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: スクワッシュナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Dragged from a kids' playground by his stem and dumped on the lawn, スクワッシュナッツ was rejected for being a deformed rubber ball. Now, furious and bumpy, he bounces wildly, yelling: "I'm gonna play all I want! ALL I WANT!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A bouncy nut who's all tantrum and impact.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>160/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Bounces in his tile when a zombie gets close, dealing splash damage on each landing. Does not block zombies while airborne.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋スクワッシュ</color>

plants.name: 銀の破滅キノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>銀の破滅キノコ turned destruction into a money-making venture — and a lucrative one at that. Of course, he spent his first fortune immediately... on a fancy new skin.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A 破滅キノコ that swapped bang for bling.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Does not explode.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>破滅キノコ＋マリーゴールド</color>

plants.name: 金の破滅キノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Ahem, eyes over here." That's how 金の破滅キノコ begins every ウォールナッツ Street summit. The other tycoons fear him—not just for his wealth, but for his power to erase their wealth in one glorious blast.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Turns money into ruin.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Does not passively explode.</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Costs 3000コイン, クールタイム：30秒; Releases a 破滅キノコ effect that does not leave a crater.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>強化コスト：</color><color=#8B0000>6000コイン</color>

plants.name: 鉄のスクワッシュ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>鉄のスクワッシュ armored up in cold steel, harder, heavier and packs more harm. Just don't mention the "rivets" on his face. He insists they're structural... not acne.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A metal-plated スクワッシュ with terrifying weight.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>3240</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Metal plant. Can be fed corresponding metal objects to restore 500 Toughness. Receives half the damage from explosive cherries.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>Bucket/Screen Door＞スクワッシュ</color>

plants.name: 津波スプルースバリスタ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>津波スプルースバリスタ once served proudly atop the castle walls, convinced his power was like a roaring tsunami. Turns out, everyone was just talking about the screech his strings made when reloading. Embarrassed but undeterred, he found salvation in aloe juice. Now his bolts are smoother, deadlier, and most importantly, much quieter.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fires tidal bolts with a tsunami's force; targets struck become more vulnerable to chill.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/1秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.
<color=black>•</color> Fires 4 bolts in quick succesion before resting for 3s.
<color=black>•</color> 90% chance to fire Tidal Bolts. Applies Soaked for 5秒. A soaked zombie will be frozen instead of chilled when hit by a cryo-system attacks. The status is then cleared and cannot be reapplied for 10秒.
<color=black>•</color> 10% chance to fire Ice Bolts. Applies Deep Chill.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>水滴アロエ＞スプルースバリスタ</color>

plants.name: ドローンナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Some claim zombies have mastered the martial arts to be able to harm plants with falling petals. Most plants dismiss it. But ドローンナッツ disagrees. "It’s true," he says, floating overhead. "I've blocked such blows. Three times."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A hovering nut that shields its tile from damage.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Absorbs damage for its own tile.
<color=black>•</color> If undamaged for 10秒, regenerates 50 HP per second.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋ブロバー</color>

plants.name: ソーンナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>ソーンナッツ proudly insists he's the true スパイクナッツ. "Look at these spines! This color!" he declares constantly. One day, someone finally asked, "Wait… who's スパイクナッツ again?"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A サボテン-covered nut that punishes attackers and disables balloon zombies.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Reflects 50 damage back to zombies biting it.
<color=black>•</color> Can pop Balloons.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋サボテン</color>

plants.name: スターナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>スターナッツ lives under a rock and rarely moves. It's not because he's lazy, but because he's got standards. He'll only act if invited by a certain square friend to jellyfishing… or to prank a neighbor.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A reactive defender that counters with little stars.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Fires five 20-damage stars in all directions when damaged.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋スターフルーツ</color>

plants.name: 冬筍蓮
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Every winter, 冬筍蓮 tries to impress potential mates with a dazzling petal display. But his performance often goes… too fast. And too cold. The girls walk away before he even finishes blooming.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A self-healing barricade that grows stronger with nearby allies.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.
<color=black>•</color> Heals himself by 50 HP when charged.
<color=black>•</color> Recovers 40 HP every 1.5秒. This HP recovery is increased by 100% for each adjacent 冬筍バリケード-type plants.
<color=black>•</color> Resilience (defaults to 1): Incoming damage is divided by resilience. Max HP is treated as multiplied by resilience. Resilience is increased by 0.3 for each adjacent 冬筍バリケード-type plants.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>冬筍バリケード＋雪蓮</color>

plants.name: 冬筍アロエ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>冬筍アロエ loves to travel and promote his snowy hometown. But no one ever seems interested. "They always think the pack on my back is just a bump from getting whacked," he complains. "No wonder they think the tundra's an unforgiving place."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>An ice-hardened barricade that thrives against cold-based zombies.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.
<color=black>•</color> Gains ice charges like 水滴アロエ.
<color=black>•</color> Resilience (defaults to 1): Incoming damage is divided by resilience. Max HP is treated as multiplied by resilience. Consumes 1 charge to raise resilience by 2. Gains 1 resilience when fighting chilled/frozen zombies (not stackable with previous ability).</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>冬筍バリケード＋水滴アロエ</color>

plants.name: スパイクナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>スパイクナッツ is always glaring, always frowning. "I need them to know I'm not a snack," he insists. The zombies, however, just laugh—because when has a ウォールナッツ ever been scary? Then they take a bite. Then they learn. The hard way.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>スパイクナッツ punctures the tires of approaching Zombonis!!

<color=black>耐久力</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Reflects 50 damage back to zombies biting it.
<color=black>•</color> Punctures incoming tires in exchange for 500 Toughness. It cannot protect against submarines or being stomped by Gargantuars.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋スパイクウィード</color>

plants.name: クラーケンキノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Sailors whisper of the Giant Kraken of the Northern Sea, its name alone enough to turn the bravest hearts cold. But Leviathan-shroom? He's got no time for legends. He didn't come to terrify—he came to play. And his favorite game? Pushing zombies around like driftwood.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can repel zombies in front.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20×2/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>耐久力</color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>
<color=#006400>Tangled Debuff: </color><color=#8B0000> Adds 1 Tangle Value per hit, dealing additional damage based on the Tangle Value.</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Repels approaching zombies (single target) and deal 100 damage.
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>もつれたケルプ＋海キノコ＋もつれたケルプ＜ヒカマホウ（中央に設置して）</color>
